remarks: A closed enough, smaller real ` C ` has the same floor of ` A ` when both are divided by ` B ` .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
lefldiveq.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
lefldiveq.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR+ ) $.
lefldiveq.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( ( A - ( A mod B ) ) [,] A ) ) $.
lefldiveq $p |- ( ph -> ( |_ ` ( A / B ) ) = ( |_ ` ( C / B ) ) ) $.
